events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because it does not fit me properly.
The customer has reported wanting a refund due to an ill-fitting product, the issue is categorized accordingly.
Assigning customer support agent Emily R. to assist with the refund request of the jacket.
Hello! This is Emily from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund for your jacket. I'm here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund, so I can check the details in our system?
Sure, the order number is 789654123 and the jacket is too small despite choosing my usual size.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund request. Please send the jacket back within 14 days using the prepaid return label I will email you shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and for providing the return label. I appreciate the smooth process.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear in your account.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund successfully and if there is anything else I can assist you with.
As the refund has been processed and confirmed, we are closing your case now. Thank you for contacting us!
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
